Introduction & Background¶

The best way to get oriented with Kintyre’s CLoud Native Runway initative is to see this post on Medium: https://medium.com/@kintyresf/71afa766d758

This content is put together to describe how to guides on setting up your own project components to build a cloud native application following Kintyre’s recommendations and best practices.
